idea: “Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.” Nelson Mandela. Teplu Learning Private Ltd empowers farmers to solve their farm level problems through active digital learning. We create practical audio, video, 3D model and animation based training courses which farmers view using their smart phones. Currently the courses are available in three languages and will be created in nine different languages. A pool of technical experts and farmers who have a proven track record of solving practical problems are used to create the courses. The courses are interactive and farmers can ask questions and resolve their queries online.
name: TEPLU LEARNING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Shastree Technocrats is a team of Chartered Engineers providing Smart Engineering Solutions. Currently, we work as Project Managers and Quantity Surveyors for various companies based in the US, UK, Australia, Middle East, and India. Simultaneously we are developing smart modular and portable houses to be constructed and erected across India.

We are looking to grow Internationally by connecting to various construction companies across the globe and provide quality Project Management services through Digital Monitoring Systems.
name: SHASTREE TECHNOCRATS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

idea:
Xclency Technology Solutions is active in Development and Commercialization of industrial products and platform that does:
- Real time tracking, monitoring and controlling of overall equipment
- Equipment and Operator performance and efficiency

- Predictive maintenance and Prevent unexpected equipment failure.
